title: " OMG EKKO TOO OP HE BURST YOU DOWN SO QUICKLY AND IS INSANELY MOBILE AND SAFE "

replies.body:
{{champion:103}} 

inb4downvotes, but u know its true.

> [{quoted}](name=Malevolentslim,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0YvxxVNq,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-29T22:16:38.139+0000)
>
> {{champion:103}} 
> 
> inb4downvotes, but u know its true.

Ahri should have her 20% back on her E, and remove some damage on her other abilities cus that was her counterplay dodging her E. She is oppressive now if you are shortranged. 

Otherwise she is balanced.

How about adjusting the damage slightly and removing the speedup on her Q that we didn't want or ask for while giving back that 20% amp?

The 'kiss-of-death' thing was their best idea for her...and they decided that was a terrible idea after all because  (insert bullshit response.)

>The 'kiss-of-death' thing was their best idea for her...and they decided that was a terrible idea after all because (insert bullshit response.)

Because... it wasn't there originally?
Because... it was only added due to of how DFG warped her gameplay from kite-mage to full on assassin?
Because... The people who played release Ahri complained about it *constantly*?

But then again. What do i know? I'm just some Purple VI scrub.

>the speedup on her Q that we didn't want or ask for

Ya... I got nothing here. That one really came out of nowhere.
also why does she need the ms boost on her q?  she already has a low cd ult with 3 dashes, why give her more mobility?
Mobility ~~sprint~~ creep is fun.

Why should I believe you? You're not even Faker
butforrealIloveyourname :u

i remember people when people would play Jarvan mid to counter her

{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Yea, but she's in a good spot. I wish they'd swap the +20% damage back, but she has to pick. She either goes all in (w/r lock-on range) or pokes (q/e) which is standard. No one wants mega move speed. No one. Its nice, but we want our fishing hook back and maybe more damage. =/

> Its nice, but we want our fishing hook back and maybe more damage. =/

A lot of people didn't like when they forced her into assassin play with the damage amp on charm.
The sh*t storm it created was kinda' crazy+. Of course, fast forward a year and now the community is going nuts about it's removal.
The forum community is funny sometimes.

+Oddly, most of her players complained that DFG was the what cause her warped play-patterns. Yet Riot said that was none-sense. Riot is funny sometimes.

Everyone is funny. I loved her playstyle, it fit the soul hunter theme she felt like. I miss it. Now its like "welp missed meh charm, doesn't matter much anyhow. lets just slam the rest of the kit." opposed to it used to be my "Soul Hunter Theme" of ` YO I HIT A CHARM! ITS GETTIN REAL DOWNTOWN!

I'm just not vocal about nerfs to my mains/buffs. I don't want riot to compensate. I'm terrified. That's why I don't mention Akali/Diana/Fiora/Ahri/Xin Zhao. Actively. But now you have my freelo list. Oh and Sivir. Sivir/Jinx go in any spot (jungle/adc/top/mid/support. literally. I tested). So those are my 7. Now hide this list. NOW. Please. They already started beating on Jinx, they massacred Akali and then they pummeled Ahri a bit. =/ Make it stop. I only have 4 left.
i made a thread about ahri but it got downvoted to oblivion by ahri weebs that only come out at night
{{champion:238}}
{{champion:55}}
Not as much as Zed, Leblanc or Ekko but you have a point
Pretty sure no one has stopped calling LB OP just because Ekko came out.
So..... if they release a champion every week they won't be able to complain about anyone?I am a genius!
{{champion:105}}
except she doesn't have a shit load of AoE cc.

>except she doesn't have a shit load of AoE cc.

. . . With a 3 second cast time.
That can't be seen till the last half a second.
You can see that hi DID cast it though, which gives you plenty of time to back off or dodge where you think its going
He cant cast it out of your vision in laning phase, i suppose after too, but thats probably just poor warding then.
You see his champion in-game do a little animation and say something, which lets you know that he's gonna use his W.
Too be fair it's pretty hard to land a good W, the Q slow is decent but not unbearable.
I guess my biggest problem isn't that 1 ability is super OP, its that everything is above average..
{{champion:1}} Stun the hell out of him with Tibbers. The End.

Do you want your {{champion:1}} to get nerfed? Because that's how you get your Annie nerfed.

You're not allowed to stop a flashy champion from making plays, you should know that by now. If you have a solution, keep it to yourself and be quiet unless you must defend it.

{{item:3070}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:45}} {{item:3070}}

They all worked as point click solutions for pesky assassins. :/

"You're not allowed to stop a flashy champion." Of course you can. Stunning them "stops them." But still, how rude of you. If I have a solution that could help people I'm gonna say it. I'm not gonna be quiet.
It's called satire, bruh. He's obviously joking.
{{champion:7}} Didn't have a massive heal with her escapes
lb is stronger then ekko. sure ekko at high level of play out scale and out preform lb. but in lane lb just cursh ekko and she dose so much more damage then ekko until late late game
I didn't know LeBlanc has a shield. And heal. And 3 slows. And a stun. And....
If you made LeBlanc melee maybe. Ekko's laning phase has not impressed me.

True LB can do that, to about 1 target, and a little AOE dmg and then she gets out and she's done. She doesnt do insane CONTINUAL dmg bassed off of multiple passives, aoe stuns, scaling shields, and scaling heals. 

And unlike Ekko, not all of her abilities do 3 different thinks.
pretty sure people complain about leblanc as well
Well what if people QQ about both? Kinda justified.
Leblanc is going to be nerfed so no worries

>  - about 23 hours ago
Yup, Le Blanc's got some problems. We're doing some work on her at the moment as a result, looking at reducing some mixture of her E's width, her W's travel speed and W's AOE size (unlikely to be all of those at once though). Our goal's to make it easier to react to her casts, whether that's dodging W or E, CCing her as she comes in with W, using defensive abilities on yourself/allies as she W's in or whatever.

by meddlereno
lol you know he was laughing when he said this... this shit aint gonna happen we all know it.. cuz you know Lee Sin/Zed syndrom
Friend, most of the community already agrees with ya on that one. No need to act like nobody does. I hate her too man.

{{champion:55}}

I actually think he's alright - he takes know-how and predictive planning to use decently, and can be countered if one knows what they're doing. 

HOWEVER. 

I do think his ratios need a huge nerf bat and they could remove the slow from his passive and reduce it on his Q.
